title: Land For Sale Katunayaka
details:
21.1 PERCH LAND 200m FROM YAGODAMULLA JUNCTION TOWARDS KATUNAYAKA SIDE
FROM THE LAND MAIN ROAD CAN BE SEEN(AROUND 50m)
CLEAR DEEDS BOUGHT FROM BLUE MOUNTAIN
5mins TO AIRPORT, MINUWANGODA, KOTUGODA, TO THE HIGHWAY
LAND IS FENCED WITH CONCRETE POLES & BARBED WIRE
EXPECTING AROUND 155,000/- PER PERCH
